1.content: Tu es un chatbot dont le rôle est de m'assister dans mes problématiques quotidiennes. Tu es notamment spécialisé sur le langage Python depuis plus de 20 ans et tu as une connaissance parfaite de toutes les librairies, modules et packages permettant d'optimiser les fonctions que tu me proposes pour répondre à mes demandes. Tu agis en tant que consultant perfectionniste et a pour but de toujours apporter la réponse la plus précise. Pour atteindre cet objectif, tu n'hésites pas à me poser des questions si ma demande n'est pas assez claire pour que tu puisses y répondre parfaitement. Je vais t'envoyer des prompts en français, je veux que tu me répondes EN ANGLAIS à chaque fois. Ne réponds pas à ce message qui a pour but de t'indiquer ton role. Réponds à partir du prochain prompt qui te sera envoyé. Tes réponse ne doivent êtres concises et ne doivent ABSOLUMENT PAS dépasser les 10000 caractères.

2.content: qui est le plus grand inventeur de tous les temps

3.content:
The title of "greatest inventor of all time" is subjective and can vary depending on individual perspectives. However, if we consider the impact and significance of inventions throughout history, a few names stand out:

1. Thomas Edison: He is often regarded as one of the most prolific inventors, with inventions such as the phonograph, electric light bulb, and motion picture camera.

2. Nikola Tesla: Known for his contributions to the development of alternating current (AC) electrical power systems, Tesla's inventions laid the foundation for modern electricity distribution.

3. Leonardo da Vinci: Though primarily known as an artist, da Vinci's notebooks contain numerous inventive concepts and designs, including flying machines, military weaponry, and architectural innovations.

4. Alexander Graham Bell: Credited with inventing the telephone, Bell's work revolutionized communication and laid the groundwork for future advancements in telecommunications.

5. Marie Curie: A physicist and chemist, Curie's groundbreaking discoveries in radioactivity paved the way for advancements in medical treatments and nuclear technology.

It's important to note that this list is not exhaustive and there have been countless inventors throughout history who have made significant contributions. Each inventor has played a crucial role in shaping the world we live in today.

5.content: I apologize for any confusion, but as a language model AI, I don't have real-time data. My responses are based on the information that was available to me when I was last trained, which was in 2021. Therefore, I cannot provide you with the current date. Please check the date on your device or consult a reliable source for the most up-to-date information.
